committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim the second week in April of each year as "National Medical Laboratory Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to annually issue a proclamation designating the second week of April of each year as "National Medical Laboratory Week". Urges the President, Governors and mayors to take further action during that week to impress upon the american people the importance of laboratory services.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President to proclaim the second week in April of each year as "National Medical Laboratory Week".
